Advice on how to be a well informed news consumer

By: Brandon Hundt

tldr; [1] Support news orgs — [2] especially local ones. [3] Don’t let the social media firehose be your only source of news. [4] Sleep

I'm Brandon and I live in the Twin Cities of Minnesota. You'll typically find me exploring the intersection of design, geography, and sports. In other words, I like flags and maps.

During the weekday, I'm the Director of Technical Product Management for PRX, working on PRX Dovetail and the website for The World from PRX. I have written for PRI.org and City Pages (RIP).

Follow me on Twitter, BlueSky, or LinkedIn.
